title: Dream Analysis and Interpretation
headline: This free online course explores the fascinating world of analysing and interpreting your dreams to foster self-growth.
description: Dreaming of a new job may be a sign of lack of fulfilment or of contentment - it all depends on the details of the dream. Dreams will always be difficult to comprehend completely but they often have a deeper meaning related to self-growth and development. By using psychotherapy approaches explained in this free course, your dreams can be analysed and interpreted to provide life-transformative insights and predictions.
courseDescription:
Dreams have always been a mystery to humans. Delighting, exciting, or sometimes even frightening, dreams have always drawn immense interest from every culture. In the past, dreams were believed to be a message for the future from the heavenly bodies. Interpreting them was based on myths and beliefs and was the role of psychics and soothsayers. In these modern and scientific times, dreams are viewed as an outcome of our mind's subconscious functions. Interpreting and analysing dreams has been affirmed in psychoanalysis as a much-in-demand therapeutic technique. This course explores the art of unravelling the mystery behind dreams and understanding what they might mean to heal yourself and others.

The course provides you with the best and most advanced methods and techniques for analysing and interpreting dreams, and becoming a capable dream analyst. This knowledge will allow you to understand your own mind better, and equip you to explain your and other people's dreams. From establishing the meaning behind symbols to explaining the interconnection between meditation and dreams, the content of this course has been specifically designed to unravel everything about dreams and get answers about common themes in them. By the end, you will have the skills to analyse, interpret, and understand dreams in a meaningful way, dealing with nightmares and transforming lives.

The content is carefully curated for people who are absolute beginners and want to understand why we dream, learn techniques of dream analysis, and explore basic symbols and themes. It will also be of great interest to psychology students and practising professionals who wish to take their knowledge to the next level. This knowledge can also come in handy to practising psychological counsellors who want to diversify their skill set and the scope of their practice. So what are you waiting for: join the course now and become an expert in unravelling and analysing dreams to bring amazing changes in your and other's lives.

Start Course Now

Once you have completed this course, you have the option to acquire an official Diploma, which is a great way to share your achievement with the world.

Your Alison is:

  • Include it in your CV, professional social media profiles and job applications.

Alison offers 3 types of Diplomas for completed Diploma courses:
  • Digital : a downloadable in PDF format immediately available to you when you complete your purchase.
  • : a physical version of your officially branded and security-marked , posted to you with FREE shipping.
  • Framed : a physical version of your officially branded and security marked in a stylish frame, posted to you with FREE shipping.

All are available to purchase through the Alison Shop. For more information on purchasing Alison , please visit our FAQs.
